description: Try our easy to follow Cheesy Garlic Bread recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Cheesy Garlic Bread Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 125 g ready-made garlic and herb butter

recipeInstructions.text: Sprinkle over the mozzarella and bake in a preheated oven, 220°C, Gas Mark 7, for 5 minutes until the cheese has melted. Cut into pieces to serve.
Sprinkle over the mozzarella and bake in a preheated oven, 220°C, Gas Mark 7, for 5 minutes until the cheese has melted. Cut into pieces to serve.
